summary:
Differnet variations of the death sequence of the chicken: decapitation, cut,crush,burn,freeze.
Yes, chicken. Must start somewere.
Beta version, be the first to try new NPCs death mechanics.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Introduction[/b]
The main goal of this mod exept entertainmentis is to test new NPCs death mecanics. So feel free to comment. Report bugs or performances issues if you find some.

[b]What it does[/b]
This mod will make chickens die in different way depending on the cause of the death. 
[u]sword[/u]  - decapitate, cut in pieces
[u]hammer[/u]  - crush
[u]fire[/u]  - leave a burned corpse
[u]frost[/u]  - freeze in block of ice that you can smash after, or not
Works for all kind of weapons and spells.
[color=red]Requires SKSE [/color]

[b]Installation[/b]
Copy files to you Skyrim folder.
For a quick test type \"bat chickenfight\" in console

[b]Compatibility[/b]
---This mod must work fine with any custom weapon, modyfied magic, combat enhacement, alternative blood and decals and other retexture mods.
---This mod will conflict with any mod that modyfies chicken.

[b]Performances[/b]
Its NOT going to kill your FPS, but high performance configuration is recommended.

[b]Permissions[/b]
Under developpement. No permissions will be given concerning this mod.
author: lamer1000
